scripts.setup: npm install && npm run migrate up && npm run lint
scripts.setup:full: npm install && npm run migrate up && npm run lint && echo 'Setup completed! Run npm start to begin.'
scripts.reset:db: npm run migrate down && npm run migrate up
scripts.test:api: echo 'Test endpoints manually or use Postman collection'
scripts.check: npm run lint && echo 'Code quality check completed'
scripts.fix: npm run lint:fix && echo 'Code issues fixed'
scripts.info: echo 'OpenMusic API v1 - Available Scripts:' && echo '  npm run setup     - Complete setup' && echo '  npm start         - Start server' && echo '  npm run dev       - Start dev server' && echo '  npm run check     - Check code quality' && echo '  npm run fix       - Fix code issues' && echo '  npm run reset:db  - Reset database'
